title: (冷門)(召喚Choir巴絲)與其唱Star Spangled Banner 其實有更加好既選擇

replies.msg:
真心
聽開Patriotic Song既
其實絕對有更加好既Choice
例如一首大家應該都或多或少聽過既March
The Stars and Stripes Forever
其實係有歌詞架
而且仲要超應景
John Philip Sousa 1895年作首歌果陣
就係講美國點樣對付嘗試威脅佢地自由既力量
君權同獨裁政府
係香港呢個咁需要美國對付獨裁鐵腕既時候
絕對係1st Choice中既1st Choice
不過呢首都幾難唱同記
所以優先推薦本身係Choir既巴絲挑戰
附上Quartet+Choir版作為參考
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nkuY4S7ysEE
(私心講句,我覺得Star Spangled Banner同佢比較係垃圾
比著我係美國人真係唱The Stars and Stripes Forever算)
歌詞如下:
Let martial note in triumph float
And liberty extend its mighty hand
A flag appears 'mid thunderous cheers,
The banner of the Western land.
The emblem of the brave and true
Its folds protect no tyrant crew;
The red and white and starry blue
Is freedom's shield and hope.

Other nations may deem their flags the best
And cheer them with fervid elation
But the flag of the North and South and West
Is the flag of flags, the flag of Freedom's nation.

Hurrah for the flag of the free!
May it wave as our standard forever,
The gem of the land and the sea,
The banner of the right.
Let despots remember the day
When our fathers with mighty endeavor
Proclaimed as they marched to the fray
That by their might and by their right
It waves forever.

Let eagle shriek from lofty peak
The never-ending watchword of our land;
Let summer breeze waft through the trees
The echo of the chorus grand.
Sing out for liberty and light,
Sing out for freedom and the right.
Sing out for Union and its might,
O patriotic sons.

Other nations may deem their flags the best
And cheer them with fervid elation,
But the flag of the North and South and West
Is the flag of flags, the flag of Freedom's nation.

Hurrah for the flag of the free.
May it wave as our standard forever
The gem of the land and the sea,
The banner of the right.
Let despots remember the day
When our fathers with might endeavor
Proclaimed as they marched to the fray,
That by their might and by their right
It waves forever.
